# Glurg - MTG Card Copier App

## Project Status
- [x] Project Requirements Clarified

- [ ] Testing with Real API

## Project Overview
A Flutter Android app for Magic: The Gathering players to quickly look up duplicate creatures from the card "It Came from Planet Glurg".

**Technology Stack:**
- Flutter (Dart)
- Scryfall API (free, public)
- Local storage only (no backend)

**User Stories Prioritized:**
1. Enter 2-5 card names manually
2. Fetch card data from Scryfall
3. Display all card stats, abilities, and artwork at once
